products.name: Dior Forever Foundation
products.description: A long-wear, high-perfection foundation that enhances your natural glow.
products.detailedDescription: Discover the latest addition to Dior's iconic lineup with the Dior Forever Foundation. This long-wear, high-perfection foundation enhances your natural glow with a flawless finish that lasts up to 24 hours. Crafted with a luxurious blend of Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, and Iron Oxides, it provides medium to full coverage while keeping skin hydrated and smooth.
products.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides
products.usageInstructions: Apply with a brush or sponge for even coverage, blend well.
benefits: Long-Lasting Perfection: Provides up to 24-hour wear with a flawless, matte finish.
Hydration & Comfort: Infused with 86% skincare ingredients to keep skin hydrated.
Flawless Coverage: Offers medium to full coverage while maintaining a natural look.
Oil Control: Minimizes shine and controls excess oil.
Skin Protection: Contains Titanium Dioxide for natural SPF benefits.

products.name: Chanel Les Beiges Blush
products.description: Soft rosy blush that gives a healthy radiance with every sweep.
products.detailedDescription: Chanel Les Beiges Blush delivers a soft, natural-looking flush that enhances your complexion with a healthy radiance.
products.ingredients: Talc, Silica, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Red 7 Lake
products.usageInstructions: Sweep onto cheeks with a blush brush, build as needed.
benefits: Natural Finish: Provides a soft, natural-looking flush
Buildable Color: Can be layered for desired intensity
Long-Wearing: Stays put throughout the day

products.name: Gucci Rouge à Lèvres Mat
products.description: Rich, creamy matte lipstick with intense color payoff.
products.detailedDescription: A new matte lipstick from Gucci Beauty. Delivers vibrant color with a soft, velvety feel. Long-lasting wear without drying the lips.
products.ingredients: Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Polysilicone-11...
products.usageInstructions: Apply directly to lips. Use the sharp edge for precise definition.
benefits: Intense Matte Color: Delivers high pigment in one swipe.
Comfortable Wear: Non-drying formula feels lightweight.
Luxurious Packaging: Features vintage-inspired gold tube.

products.name: Lancôme Lash Idôle Mascara
products.description: Lash-lifting mascara for fanned-out volume.
products.detailedDescription: Achieve lifted, defined lashes with Lancôme Lash Idôle Mascara. Its curved brush grabs every lash for instant lift, length, and clump-free volume.
products.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Propylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer...
products.usageInstructions: Hold wand horizontally and apply from root to tip. Use curved side to lift and fan out lashes.
benefits: Instant Lash Lift: Provides visible lift and curl.
Fanned-Out Volume: Separates and volumizes each lash.
Clump-Free Formula: Lightweight gel formula resists clumping.
Long-Lasting: Up to 24-hour wear.

products.name: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Primer
products.description: Instant retouch primer that smooths pores and extends makeup wear.
products.detailedDescription: Start your makeup routine with the Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Primer. This oil-free primer smooths away the look of pores, evens skin tone and texture, and helps makeup last longer.
products.ingredients: Dimethicone, Isododecane, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer...
products.usageInstructions: Apply one pump to fingertips and spread evenly over face before foundation.
benefits: Smooths Skin: Blurs pores and imperfections.
Extends Makeup Wear: Helps foundation apply better and last longer.
Oil-Free Formula: Lightweight and comfortable for all skin types.
Universal Shade: Works for all skin tones.

products.name: Tom Ford Traceless Soft Matte Foundation
products.description: A hydrating matte foundation that blurs imperfections and lasts all day.
products.detailedDescription: Experience luxury with Tom Ford's Traceless Soft Matte Foundation. This innovative formula offers medium-to-full coverage with a natural matte finish, while hydrating skin for comfortable, long wear.
products.ingredients: Dimethicone, Water, Phenyl Trimethicone, Methyl Trimethicone...
products.usageInstructions: Shake well. Apply to clean face using fingertips, sponge, or foundation brush.
benefits: Soft Matte Finish: Provides a natural, shine-free look.
Hydrating Formula: Contains hyaluronic acid for moisture.
Long-Wearing: Resists humidity and sweat.
Buildable Coverage: Customizable from medium to full.

products.name: YSL Touche Éclat Radiant Concealer Pen
products.description: The iconic highlighting pen that brightens, smooths, and perfects.
products.detailedDescription: YSL's Touche Éclat is a cult classic for a reason. This light-infused pen instantly brightens dark circles, smooths fine lines, and highlights features without shimmer or glitter.
products.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Talc, Glycerin...
products.usageInstructions: Click pen to dispense product. Apply to areas needing brightening (under eyes, brow bone, cupid's bow) and blend.
benefits: Instant Radiance: Brightens complexion and adds light.
Smooths Imperfections: Visibly reduces signs of fatigue.
Versatile Use: Can be used for concealing, highlighting, and contouring.
Lightweight Feel: Non-cakey formula blends seamlessly.

products.name: La Mer The Moisturizing Soft Cream
products.description: A luxurious cream that delivers healing moisture for a vibrant appearance.
products.detailedDescription: Indulge in La Mer's Moisturizing Soft Cream. Infused with the legendary Miracle Broth™, this ultra-soft cream deeply hydrates, heals dryness, and restores radiance for a youthful look.
products.ingredients: Algae (Seaweed) Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Petrolatum, Glyceryl Distearate...
products.usageInstructions: Pat a small amount between fingertips and press gently into cleansed skin, morning and night.
benefits: Deep Hydration: Provides lasting moisture and heals dryness.
Renews Radiance: Restores skin's natural vibrancy.
Smooths Fine Lines: Diminishes the look of lines and wrinkles.
Legendary Miracle Broth™: Soothes and revitalizes skin.

products.name: Pat McGrath Labs Mothership Eyeshadow Palette
products.description: Iconic eyeshadow palettes with extraordinary textures and cosmic colors.
products.detailedDescription: Unleash your inner artist with Pat McGrath Labs Mothership Palettes. Featuring a curated selection of stunning mattes, shimmering metallics, and otherworldly special shades with unparalleled pigment and blendability.
products.ingredients: Talc, Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate...
products.usageInstructions: Apply shadows using brushes or fingertips. Use damp brush for intensified pigment.
benefits: Exceptional Pigment: Rich, vibrant color payoff.
Unique Textures: Creamy mattes, dazzling shimmers, and special effects.
Blendable Formula: Shadows blend seamlessly for endless looks.
Luxurious Packaging: Housed in sleek, collectible palettes.

products.name: Charlotte Tilbury Magic Cream
products.description: An instant turnaround moisturizer for hydrated, glowing, plumper-looking skin.
products.detailedDescription: Charlotte's famous Magic Cream is a secret weapon for celebrities and models. This rich, hydrating cream features Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, and BioNymph Peptide Complex to flood skin with moisture and create a dewy canvas.
products.ingredients: Water, Homosalate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Ethylhexyl Salicylate...
products.usageInstructions: Apply to face and neck using Charlotte's 'Tilbury Tap' massage technique.
benefits: Instant Hydration Boost: Plumps skin with moisture.
Creates Glowing Canvas: Perfect base for makeup.
Reduces Wrinkles: Firms and smooths the look of skin.
Contains SPF15: Provides daily sun protection.

products.name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Powder
products.description: Finishing powders that recreate the most flattering types of light.
products.detailedDescription: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Powders use Photoluminescent Technology to filter out harsh light and refine the appearance of the complexion. Each powder captures, diffuses, and softens surrounding light.
products.ingredients: Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Boron Nitride, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer...
products.usageInstructions: Dust all over the face with a powder brush as the final step in your makeup routine.
benefits: Photoluminescent Technology: Creates a soft-focus effect.
Filters Harsh Light: Blurs imperfections and minimizes pores.
Enhances Complexion: Adds a subtle, natural glow.
Versatile Shades: Different powders create different lighting effects.

products.name: Armani Beauty Luminous Silk Foundation
products.description: Award-winning, oil-free foundation that delivers a luminous, buildable finish.
products.detailedDescription: Inspired by charmeuse silk, Armani's Luminous Silk Foundation offers a flawless, radiant finish. The Micro–fil™ technology allows for buildable coverage from sheer to medium, gliding seamlessly onto the skin.
products.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Isododecane...
products.usageInstructions: Apply with fingertips or foundation brush, starting from the center of the face and blending outwards.
benefits: Radiant Finish: Creates a lit-from-within glow.
Buildable Coverage: Perfect for customizing your look.
Oil-Free Formula: Suitable for most skin types.
Seamless Application: Blends effortlessly for a natural look.

products.name: NARS Orgasm Blush
products.description: Iconic peachy-pink blush with golden shimmer.
products.detailedDescription: The universally flattering NARS Orgasm Blush provides a natural-looking flush with a hint of shimmer. Its micronized powder ensures soft, blendable application.
products.ingredients: Talc, Octyldodecyl Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate...
products.usageInstructions: Apply to the apples of the cheeks using a blush brush.
benefits: Universally Flattering Shade: Suits a wide range of skin tones.
Buildable Color: From subtle flush to bold pop.
Subtle Shimmer: Adds a healthy glow.
Blendable Formula: Applies smoothly and evenly.

products.name: Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil
products.description: A nurturing lip oil that enhances lip color and provides intense hydration.
products.detailedDescription: Pamper your lips with Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil. Infused with cherry oil, this non-sticky, non-greasy formula protects, nourishes, and revitalizes lips while bringing out their natural color.
products.ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Polybutene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate...
products.usageInstructions: Apply directly to lips as needed throughout the day.
benefits: Intense Hydration: Nourishes and softens lips.
Color Reviving: Enhances natural lip color.
Glossy Shine: Provides a mirror-like shine.
Non-Sticky Formula: Comfortable to wear.

products.name: Guerlain Météorites Pearls Powder
products.description: Color-correcting and illuminating pearls for a radiant complexion.
products.detailedDescription: Guerlain Météorites are multi-colored pearls that blend together to color-correct, mattify, and illuminate the skin. Features Stardust Technology for a soft-focus halo.
products.ingredients: Talc, Nylon-12, Magnesium Myristate, Magnesium Carbonate...
products.usageInstructions: Swirl a powder brush over the pearls and apply evenly all over the face.
benefits: Color Correction: Evens out skin tone.
Illuminating Effect: Adds subtle radiance.
Mattifies Skin: Controls shine without looking flat.
Iconic Violet Scent: Delicate and pleasant fragrance.

products.name: Givenchy Prisme Libre Loose Powder
products.description: A 4-color loose powder for a flawless, matte, and radiant finish.
products.detailedDescription: Givenchy's Prisme Libre features four harmonious shades that blend to mattify, blur imperfections, and enhance radiance. The ultra-fine texture feels weightless on the skin.
products.ingredients: Talc, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Dimethicone...
products.usageInstructions: Shake powder, then apply using the included puff or a powder brush.
benefits: Color Correction & Radiance: Four shades work together for perfect skin.
Mattifying Effect: Controls shine for hours.
Blurs Imperfections: Creates a smooth, airbrushed look.
Ultra-Fine Texture: Feels light and comfortable.

products.name: Cle de Peau Beauté Concealer SPF 27
products.description: A cult-favorite stick concealer that provides seamless coverage and sun protection.
products.detailedDescription: This luxurious concealer from Clé de Peau Beauté blends effortlessly to cover dark circles, blemishes, and imperfections with a smooth, long-lasting finish. Includes SPF 27.
products.ingredients: Titanium Dioxide, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Cyclopentasiloxane, Mica...
products.usageInstructions: Extend stick 1cm. Apply directly to area and blend with fingertips or brush.
benefits: Seamless Coverage: Blends perfectly into skin.
Long-Lasting Wear: Stays put without creasing.
SPF 27 Protection: Protects delicate skin.
Creamy Texture: Applies smoothly and easily.

products.name: Sisley Paris Black Rose Cream Mask
products.description: An instant youth and radiance-boosting mask.
products.detailedDescription: Give your skin an instant boost with Sisley's Black Rose Cream Mask. Rich in trace elements, vitamins, and plant extracts, it revitalizes, plumps, and brightens tired skin in minutes.
products.ingredients: Water, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate...
products.usageInstructions: Apply a thick layer to face and neck, avoiding eye area. Leave on for 10-15 minutes, then wipe off excess.
benefits: Instant Radiance: Leaves skin looking luminous.
Plumps Skin: Smooths and fills fine lines.
Revitalizes Tired Skin: Fights signs of fatigue.
Hydrating & Soothing: Comforts and moisturizes.

products.name: By Terry Hyaluronic Hydra-Powder
products.description: Weightless translucent setting powder infused with hyaluronic acid.
products.detailedDescription: Set your makeup while hydrating your skin with By Terry's Hyaluronic Hydra-Powder. This colorless, micro-fine powder blurs imperfections, controls shine, and locks in moisture.
products.ingredients: Silica, Sodium Hyaluronate
products.usageInstructions: Apply after foundation using a powder brush or puff.
benefits: Hydrating Formula: Contains hyaluronic acid to prevent dryness.
Blurs Imperfections: Creates a soft-focus effect.
Controls Shine: Mattifies skin without looking cakey.
Sets Makeup: Extends makeup wear.

products.name: Westman Atelier Vital Skin Foundation Stick
products.description: A clean, creamy foundation stick with buildable coverage and a natural finish.
products.detailedDescription: Created by makeup artist Gucci Westman, this foundation stick melts into skin for a second-skin finish. Formulated with nourishing ingredients, it provides buildable coverage while combating redness.
products.ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Isodecyl Neopentanoate...
products.usageInstructions: Swipe directly onto skin and blend with fingertips, brush, or sponge.
benefits: Clean Formula: Free from silicones, parabens, PEGs, etc.
Natural Finish: Looks like real skin.
Buildable Coverage: Customizable for different needs.
Nourishing Ingredients: Soothes and calms skin.

products.name: Hermès Rouge Hermès Matte Lipstick
products.description: An ultra-pigmented matte lipstick in a refillable, artistic case.
products.detailedDescription: Experience the luxury of Hermès beauty with this comfortable matte lipstick. It offers intense, long-lasting color with a powdery finish, housed in a stunning refillable case designed by Pierre Hardy.
products.ingredients: Isononyl Isononanoate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Squalane...
products.usageInstructions: Apply directly from bullet or use a lip brush for precision.
benefits: Intense Matte Color: Highly pigmented formula.
Comfortable Wear: Second-skin feel.
Refillable Case: Sustainable and luxurious design.
Long-Lasting: Color stays vibrant for hours.

products.name: Natasha Denona Glam Eyeshadow Palette
products.description: A sophisticated palette of neutral, cool-toned shades for everyday glam.
products.detailedDescription: The Natasha Denona Glam Palette features 15 ultra-pigmented cool and neutral shades in matte, metallic, and sparkling finishes. Perfect for creating versatile looks from day to night.
products.ingredients: Mica, Talc, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate...
products.usageInstructions: Apply shadows using brushes or fingertips. Use transition shades in the crease, darker shades to define, and shimmers on the lid.
benefits: High Pigmentation: Intense color payoff.
Creamy & Blendable: Easy to apply and blend.
Versatile Shades: Cool and neutral tones for various looks.
Long-Wearing: Shadows stay put without creasing.

products.name: SK-II Facial Treatment Essence
products.description: Iconic essence with Pitera™ to transform skin to crystal clear.
products.detailedDescription: SK-II's signature product, the Facial Treatment Essence, is rich in Pitera™, a bio-ingredient containing vitamins, amino acids, and minerals. It helps improve skin texture, radiance, firmness, and reduces spots.
products.ingredients: Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate (Pitera), Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Water...
products.usageInstructions: Pour a few drops into palms, press gently onto face and neck after cleansing and toning.
benefits: Improves Texture: Smooths and refines skin surface.
Boosts Radiance: Enhances natural glow.
Increases Firmness: Improves skin elasticity.
Reduces Spots: Lessens the appearance of dark spots.

products.name: Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base
products.description: A primer plus moisturizer for smooth makeup application.
products.detailedDescription: Bobbi Brown's bestselling Face Base combines the performance of a primer with the cushion of a moisturizer. Enriched with Vitamins B, C, and E, plus Shea Butter, it hydrates, softens, and primes skin.
products.ingredients: Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butylene Glycol...
products.usageInstructions: Apply to just-cleansed skin, avoiding eye area, before makeup.
benefits: Hydrates & Primes: Multitasking formula saves time.
Smooths Skin Texture: Creates an even canvas for makeup.
Nourishing Vitamins: Enriched with skin-loving vitamins.
Uplifting Scent: Subtle grapefruit and geranium fragrance.

products.name: HYPNÔSE EYESHADOW PALETTE
products.description: Versatile 5-color eyeshadow palette for creating various eye looks.
products.detailedDescription: Lancôme Hypnôse Eyeshadow Palette offers 5 complementary shades to easily create natural to dramatic eye looks. Features rich pigments and a smooth, blendable texture.
products.ingredients: Talc, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Triisostearin...
products.usageInstructions: Use applicator or brush to apply shadows. Use lighter shades as base, medium on lid, darker in crease.
benefits: Versatile Shades: Create multiple looks with one palette.
Rich Pigment: Intense color payoff.
Blendable Texture: Applies smoothly.
Includes Applicators: Convenient for on-the-go.

products.name: Chantecaille Future Skin Foundation
products.description: An oil-free gel foundation with a refreshing, lightweight texture.
products.detailedDescription: Chantecaille Future Skin is an innovative oil-free gel foundation containing 60% water. It provides adjustable coverage and feels incredibly light, leaving skin looking naturally perfected.
products.ingredients: Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Titanium Dioxide, Butylene Glycol...
products.usageInstructions: Apply with fingertips or foundation brush, blending well.
benefits: Lightweight Gel Texture: Feels refreshing and comfortable.
Oil-Free Formula: Suitable for various skin types.
Adjustable Coverage: Buildable from light to medium.
Natural Finish: Looks like perfected skin.

products.name: Lancôme Cushion Foundation
products.description: A lightweight cushion foundation for a fresh, dewy glow.
products.detailedDescription: Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Cushion Foundation provides buildable coverage with a refreshing feel. Perfect for touch-ups on the go, leaving skin looking hydrated and radiant.
products.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isononyl Isononanoate...
products.usageInstructions: Press puff into cushion and pat onto skin. Layer for more coverage.
benefits: Dewy Glow: Creates a radiant, hydrated look.
Buildable Coverage: Customizable finish.
Portable Compact: Easy for touch-ups.
Refreshing Feel: Lightweight and cool on skin.

products.name: Augustinus Bader The Rich Cream
products.description: An intensely luxurious, hydrating cream powered by TFC8® technology.
products.detailedDescription: Augustinus Bader's The Rich Cream is formulated for drier skin types or nighttime use. Powered by Trigger Factor Complex (TFC8®), it supports cellular renewal, reduces signs of aging, and deeply moisturizes.
products.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil...
products.usageInstructions: Apply to cleansed, dry skin morning and evening.
benefits: TFC8® Technology: Supports skin's natural renewal processes.
Intense Hydration: Ideal for dry or mature skin.
Reduces Aging Signs: Minimizes wrinkles and improves firmness.
Improves Radiance: Leaves skin looking healthy and youthful.

products.name: Victoria Beckham Beauty Satin Kajal Liner
products.description: A highly pigmented, creamy eyeliner pencil that glides on smoothly.
products.detailedDescription: Define your eyes with Victoria Beckham Beauty's Satin Kajal Liner. This versatile pencil offers rich color payoff, blends easily for a smoky look, and sets to a waterproof finish.
products.ingredients: Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Silica, Stearyl Dimethicone...
products.usageInstructions: Apply along lash line. Smudge immediately for a smoky effect before it sets.
benefits: Creamy Glide: Applies effortlessly without tugging.
Rich Pigment: Intense color in one stroke.
Blendable & Waterproof: Versatile for sharp or smoky looks.
Clean Formula: Vegan and cruelty-free.

products.name: HYPNÔSE DOLL EYES MASCARA
products.description: Mascara for a wide-eye, doll lash effect.
products.detailedDescription: Dreaming of a Doll Lash effect? Hypnôse Doll Eyes mascara coats every single lash without weighing them down, for a wide-eye look. The cone-shaped brush defines even corner lashes.
products.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Paraffin, Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Carnauba Wax...
products.usageInstructions: Apply from lash base to tip in a zigzag motion. Use tip of cone brush for corner lashes.
benefits: Doll Lash Effect: Creates wide-eyed, fanned-out lashes.
Lifts & Lengthens: Defines and extends lashes.
Cone Brush: Reaches every lash.
Lightweight Formula: Doesn't weigh lashes down.
